page.title: 13HISTORY IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: There are two historic houses in the area,{CANFORD MANOR}and{MERLEY HOUSE. {CANFORD MANOR}which is mentioned in the DOMESDAY BOOK,was granted to the EUREUX family by William 1st.It passed through the hands of the Mont- eacute family(Earls of Salisbury),and as part of the Duchy of Lancaster,fre- quently reverted to the Crown.Among the Lords of Canford was WILLIAM LONG- SPEE,half brother of KING JOHN.The old Manor House was pulled down in 1766. The present house is mainly Victorian Gothic,designed by Edward Blore in GEORGE IV's reign and Sir Charles Barry in 1843.In 1922 the Manor was bought from LORD WIMBORNE to become a school.One of the modern estates comm- emorates by its road names,Sir Alan Cobhams Flying Circus 1932-35 which was housed on the site.His employees club is now Flights Sports Club.
